thread.title: 19 totally rational fears every New Yorker has
thread.title_full: 19 totally rational fears every New Yorker has

author: Brian Koerber
title: 19 totally rational fears every New Yorker has
text:
19 totally rational fears every New Yorker has 302 2017-02-04 17:29:05 UTC 
New York City is trying to kill you. 
There's no doubt that New York is a special place like no other, but with that comes some unavoidable dangers that the city's 8.5 million residents must endure on a daily basis like some sort of urban obstacle course. 4. Getting dripped on by some strange liquid. Keep telling yourself it's just water. 
Image: Chris Hondros/Getty Images 7. Accidentally sitting in poop/pee on the subway. 8. Getting your leg stuck in a revolving door. 9. Not being able to find a public bathroom in time. 10. Dropping your phone onto the subway tracks. So this is what happens if you drop your phone onto the subway tracks. pic.twitter.com/2lbx5YAH9P 11. Getting hit by a car while crossing the street. 
Image: Michael Nagle/Getty Images 12. Tripping while rushing down subway station stairs. 13. The puddle being deeper than you think. 
Image: Spencer Platt/Getty Images 15. Seeing a huge snake on the subway. Just another night on the #NYC #subway : on the Q train fr. Brighton Beach, a guy with his #boa #constrictor #snake pic.twitter.com/WpQUPyJgqB 
— Anne Fizzard (@AnneFizzard) July 4, 2016 16. Being stuck behind a tourist while waiting to fill/use your MetroCard. 17. Worrying that the apartment you just rented is actually a scam . 18. Times Square — no explanation needed.
